text: @GregAbbott_TX Texas was lucky to have escaped the huge number of deaths of other locations, experts don’t understand why. But it’s not because of the leadership, slow to close. But that doesn’t change the fact that people are still dying in Texas and Covid-19 remains a huge threat.
